name: Hilton University of Florida Conference Center Gainesville

reviews.text: Mr. Wagih William, the F&B Director provided exceptional support to our family. We had to arrange a post-memorial service at very short notice. My William worked with us to organize a group of rooms for friends and relatives and a meal for what was meant to be a small group. The memorial service was attended by so many members of the community - and their love and support has been incredible - Mr William had to double the capacity for us on the fly. He and his team were remarkably calm, did not let us worry about a single issue and jumped to the task of providing support while allowing the family the chance to be with each other.
reviews.title: Exceptional Service - under stressful circumstances

reviews.text: Thank you - and Thank you again for making it so easy for us.
reviews.title: excellent customer service! Wagih William, the food & beverage director, goes the extra mile! I alwa

reviews.text: Dhiren
reviews.title: Business Trip to Gainesville

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great room accommodations and excellent customer service! Wagih William, the Food & Beverage Director, and my favorite waitress Denise, goes the extra mile! I always come in to Albert's restaurant for the breakfast buffet and the food is always too notch. Definitely, the best breakfast buffet in Gainesville!
reviews.title: Very clean accomodations

reviews.text: Being a road warrior, I did my research before making a reservation in Gainesville, FL. for a two nt. stay. Location, service and a fitness ctr. are my key criteria. This University Hilton has a great location away from the downtown noise and close to the University area. Several restaurants nearby and a large conference ctr. at the hotel. The other key factor was the fitness ctr. with state of the art equipment and large enough so it is not crowded as so many hotels are in this era. The breakfast buffet included several different options.
reviews.title: Good Experience Here for a Conference

reviews.text: I was a little uncertain about whether or not this hotel was going to be worth the price on gator game day but it definitely was! From the ease of check-in to the comfortable beds, I was definitely made
reviews.title: Very Impressed!

reviews.text: Comfortable. And what was best was coming back from the game hungry and tired after being in the afternoon sun for 3 hours and getting great service in the lounge. They were all so polite and very accomadating when I asked to have something made that wasn't on the menu. Overall it was a great experience and a definite do-again!!
reviews.title: Very nice stays

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel twice this year (May and July) for business.
reviews.title: Need MORE like this....!

reviews.text: Pros: great location, clean, nice lobby, Peter Thomas Roth toiletries (my favorite part of the stay), very comfortable room and bed, very friendly staff (from front desk to restaurant hostess and waitresses)
reviews.title: Best hotel in Hogtown

reviews.text: Cons: Restaurant was nice but food was really bad
reviews.title: Greatest

reviews.text: I utilize this property for business in Gainesville often
reviews.title: The staff caters to your needs like as found in even higher priced hotels
Hotel dining is wonderful! Top-notch service
reviews.text: Wagih, Willie and the Dining staff especially provide a personal touch that keeps myself and coworkers coming back
Albert's restaurant has a good variety of selections with great food quality right on the premises
reviews.title: Great night Sleep

reviews.text: Our team travels to Gainesville annually for three months minimum. The hotel worked to earn our business and we very much appreciate all the effort. But it's the service and willingness to go over and above for us daily we receive at Albert's, the hotel restaurant, that has made our stay so pleasant. The team at Albert's goes out of their way to make our down time pleasant. That make sure we have everything we need, ask for and don't think to ask for. This level of service continues to bring additional members of our team from other hotels to stay at the UF Hilton. If you have a business or personal need that brings you to Gainesville, FL, I highly recommend this hotel and dining at Albert's. They treat all guests well not just groups. Our team is not huge, but you would think there were 200 of us with the treatment we receive. Hotel staff, sales staff, really everyone is a pleasure to deal with. I travel a lot with my job and frequent quality hotels. The service at this property is a distinct cut above. The hotel is pet friendly, people friendly, business, personal and family traveler friendly. Albert's hits the mark with in-room and dining room service three squares a day. Thank you for making business travel a lot easier for me and my colleagues. It just makes the work week better.
reviews.title: Great service & good food

reviews.text: As a final kudos, UF Hilton and Albert's have converted this Marriott rewards member to a Hilton gal gor good. There are perks and then there are PERKS that only come from consistent quality customer service. Thank you again for providing this for us. I rarely submit a review, but this was very much worth my time as its such a treat to be treated so well so consistently. At UF Hilton and Albert's they are true "hospitality professionals.". They set the bar very high then reach or exceed it daily.
reviews.title: Fantastic service

reviews.text: The best hotel in the city of Gainesville! The staff goes above and beyond to make certain you are taken care of. Rooms are nice and comfortable. Slept like a baby each night. Ate in the restaurant/bar several times and was always welcomed back with a smile!!!! Try the steak salad....which ended up being my favorite. If I travel back to Gainesville I will definetly stay at this hotel again. Thanks Hilton!
reviews.title: AMAZING STAFF! AMAZING HOTEL!

reviews.text: We came to Gainesville to admit our daughter to Shands Hospital. The room was booked because of location, We requested a handicapped room.
reviews.title: Disappointing

reviews.text: We checked in and were assigned a room on the 7th floor. The bath tub was definitely not handicapped assessible.
reviews.title: Very Likeable!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room had not been dusted in awhile,bathroom floors were not clean and the beds were very uncomfortable.
reviews.title: We always return

reviews.text: I realize that we were given a discounted rate due to using Shands hospital but I would have gladly given up the discount for a comfortable bed and clean room. Management reduced our bill by 3%.
reviews.title: Game weekend

reviews.text: Great location and excellent staff. I visited for a University of Florida football weekend so the price was much higher than the typical rate. But the convenience due to location and transportation to and from the game made it an excellent experience.
reviews.title: 34th St Gainesville Hilton Review

reviews.text: If you're coming to Gainesville to visit UF, this is a viable choice with a convenient location. However, the hotel needs some general renovations. Staff is friendly & helpful but front desk takes forever to answer! Limited rooms with king beds, so I was stuck with 2 doubles and there's only one of me!
reviews.title: Nice hotel overall but could use some renovations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: $400 for basic room because of game weekend. expected more for the price but i guess its supply and demand. located at the periphery of campus. no mini fridge. towels were so so. toiletries were fine. friendly staff
reviews.title: overpriced due to game weekend

reviews.text: We have been staying at the Hilton Gainesville for the last 10 years. It is our favorite hotel in Gainesville and we have always been happy with the staff, service and amenities. This past weekend we noticed and commented that the staff seemed to be even more friendly and attentive. The atmosphere was very festive as it was a "game" weekend. We were impressed with all of the employees but especially would like to applaud Wagih William, the Food and Beverage Director. We highly recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Great hotel in Gainesville

reviews.text: Not happy with the selections on the dinner and lunch menu. Enjoyed the breakfast buffet, price was about $5.00 too steep. The Lunch buffet was too steep for salad and soup.Not happy with the selections on the dinner and lunch menu. Enjoyed the breakfast buffet, price was about $5.00 too steep. The Lunch buffet was too steep for salad and soup.

We stayed at the Hilton Conference Center in Gainesville again this month and we were well treated and well cared for. The rooms are always clean, the hotel grounds are meticulously groomed and the location is perfect for visiting our daughter and her husband. One morning we were searching for coffee and the hotel's chief engineer personally directed me to where the coffee re-fills were and made sure I was able to get into the elevator and select the right floor with my hands occupied with hot cups of coffee! He probably had more mechanical challenges he could have been working on but he made sure that my wife and I had hot coffee to get our day going! It was a nice break from the usual "it's not my job" scenarios most travelers experience!
reviews.title: Consistently Good!

reviews.text: The Hilton near UF is fantastic and pretty close to perfect. The hotel is in a great location for anyone visiting the University of Florida. The lobby is very nice, and includes a bar and restaurant. The front desk staff is very professional and helpful. Room is spacious and modern. There are two desk spaces and plenty of outlets, which is helpful when charging electronics. Always love the lavazza coffee. Beds are comfortable and room is very clean. The TV seems a little small for the large furniture, but is a nice flat screen LG. It simply sits on a giant dresser, making it seemingly small. I would highly recommend the hotel.
reviews.title: Perfection

reviews.text: The lobby restaurant is excellent and servers are friendly. My stay was only one night but it was very comfortable and other Hiltons should site visit this one when they are training their housekeeping staff! This property is a great example and sets a great standard.
reviews.title: Hilton Delivers Quality Service

reviews.text: I have stayed here for 3-4 days a week since Aug 2012. I have not been disappointed. The Front desk is very personable. They are very eager to provide great service and make you feel at Home. The restaurant’s food is good and the service is very good. The F&B director is actively involved to assure that you are very satisfied. My only issue is there is way too much Gator Stuff in the lobby; however that’s understandable since it’s the home of those gators. Go Dawgs!
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel!

reviews.text: The accommodations, the staff, the rooms, the food and everything else at this hotel is A+. Would recommend to anyone in town for a UF game, passing thru or just looking for a great staycation destination. A+++
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.text: I have stayed here several times for business. The location is good with lots of restaurant choices in the area. The room is nice, the hotel is clean and well kept up. The staff is helpful and service-oriented.
reviews.title: Good hotel for business
Gainesville Florida getaway weekend
reviews.text: This was the best hotel in the area to stay for a quick visit to Gainesville for my niece's baby shower. The Gators were out of town, so this was perfect. Beautiful rooms, reasonably priced, staff was very helpful, great gym and pool.

reviews.title: Not Hilton caliber
reviews.text: Not impressed with this hotel. I consider a Hilton to be a step above your average chain hotel, but this property was mediocre at best. Very convenient to UF, very nice pool and workout area but the service was lacking. Check in was poor, was told there were no kings available despite having booked it months ago. When pressured, the clerk did manage to find a king room. Check in took entirely too long as a result. No free breakfast, no tissues in bathroom, room not made up as of 2 pm so far, Internet goes out constantly, not free in rooms, no newspapers offered. These amenities are commonly found in lesser chains. No real reason to stay at this property unless here for a conference. Not cheap either.

Friendly,helpful staff,clean facilities,would stay again. I recommend this facility without any hesitations,location is on campus,very convenient to students and families. Five minutes from Shands,excellent place to stay for the big game no matter who you are routing for. Alot of Tebow pictures,who doesn't like and respect Tebow!!
reviews.title: Overnight in Gatorland

reviews.text: Conveniently located to campus with shuttle transportation to the stadium right out the front door. Staff were friendly and efficiently even to the opposing team fans. Breakfast was excellent. Will definitely book this hotel again.
reviews.title: Football Weekend

reviews.text: Our 5th trip to this hotel confirmed that selecting this property is always a safe and consistent choice. The grounds are clean, the front desk staff is polite and helpful and the food and beverage people do a nice job. The maintenance staff were not able to correct problems with the TV set and channel selection but they tried and gave me a drink coupon as compensation for the inconvenience. Housekeeping appeared late in the day and was a bit incomplete in their service to the room. The food and beverage staff were attentive and friendly even though we were sitting outside on the patio, making their service somewhat inconvenient for them. The minor variances to their usually outstanding service won't deter us from future stays. It's a nice property and a great location.
reviews.title: A Very Good Stay

reviews.text: From the moment you arrive until you are checking out, the staff at this Hilton treats you like you are royalty!!
reviews.title: By far, the best staff and hotel experience

reviews.text: Tony and Wagih, the Directors of the hotel are the friendliest and most helpful guys in Gainesville.
reviews.title: One of the best Hiltons

reviews.text: Akari, D'arcy, Vito and the entire front desk and restaurant staff go above and beyond to make your stay away from home very comfortable!
reviews.title: On of the best Hiltons

reviews.text: I would recommend this hotel to everyone if they are ever in the Gainesville area.
reviews.title: great location, clean hotel what more do u need?

aka: Hilton University Of Florida Conference Center Gainesville Hotel Gainesville
description: Situated on the Southwest corner of the University of Florida campus, in the heart of “Gator Nation”, Hilton University of Florida is the perfect spot for conducting essential business without missing out on the pleasure. This property has been completely renovated in the last three years, offers complimentary wireless internet in our lobby, complimentary parking, and a complimentray business center for guest use. A full service restaurant is available for breakfast, lunch or dinner. Two Bit's lounge or room service can make your day easier. Visit the Olympic size outdoor pool or our complimentary fitness center.
